roleset.name: State of preparation

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: In Chapter VI of Vanity Fair , Thackeray reports on Joe Sedley 's drunken avowal to wed Becky Sharp the next morning , even if he had to “ knock up the Archbishop of Canterbury at Lambeth , ” in order *PRO* to have him in readiness to perform the ceremony .

roleset.note: Based on verb entry ready.01. Corresponds to VN Class preparing-26.3-1. Framed by Claire.
